sense.def:
Kadar nekaj ob dotiku
feels hard
, je zelo trdo in se tistega ne da zlahka ukriviti, prerezati ali zlomiti.

seg.quote: The green fruits were as hard as rocks.
We gave them cushions to ease the hardness of the benches.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
hard to do or to understand
, je tisto težko storiti ali razumeti.

seg.quote: He found it hard to make friends.
That is a very hard question to answer.

sense.def:
To try hard
ali
to work hard
pomeni močno se potruditi, da bi nekaj dosegli.

seg.quote: I cannot stand upright, no matter how hard I try.
He had worked hard all his life.
Think hard about what I'm offering.

sense.def:
Delo, ki je
hard
, zahteva veliko napora.

seg.quote: This has been a long hard day.
It was very hard work in the shop.

sense.def:
Hard
pomeni tudi z veliko silo.

seg.quote: The government's first reaction to the riots was to clamp down hard.

sense.def:
Kdor je
hard
, ne kaže prijaznosti ali usmiljenja.

seg.quote: His hard grey eyes began to soften a little.

sense.def:
To be hard on someone or something
pomeni nekomu ali nečemu povzročiti trpljenje ali škodo.

seg.quote: It seemed rather hard on the women.
This work's hard on the feet.

sense.def:
One's life is hard
rečemo, kadar je življenje težko in neprijetno.

Zima ali zmrzal, ki je
hard
, je zelo hladna ali ostra.

Dejstva, ki so
hard
, so vsekakor resnična.

seg.quote: We have no hard evidence to indicate that he is the culprit.

sense.def:
Droga, ki je
hard
, je močna, na primer heroin ali kokain; take droge so prepovedane.

Člane političnih strank, ki so skrajnega prepričanja, lahko imenujemo
the hard left
ali
the hard right
.

To feel hard done by
pomeni imeti občutek, da so z nami ravnali krivično.
